import React, { useState, useEffect, Fragment } from "react"; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import moment from 'moment' import './UserProfile.css' import Button from '../../../../button/Button' import { RiCake2Line } from 'react-icons/all' import Avatar from "../../../../../assets/avatar_default.png" export default function UserProfile() { return (
u/{username}
 
Cake day {moment(date_joined_updated).format('MMMM Do YYYY, h:mm a')}
{following} Following,
{followers} Followers
) }
